name: Pixelsquare's Adventures
description:
This game is all about your movements. Jump to win the game.

Hear the beats and jump accordingly. DON'T trust the beats fully.

What are you waiting for?? Download now!!!

How to play the game:

-> W and Mouse Button 0 for jumping. (Left Mouse Button)

[Made with unity , atom editor , visual studio](Credits are in the game.)

Contact us : raghav15102004@gmail.com

Have fun!!!
